title: Robbery under arms [DVD]
creator_credit: Jock Blair, South Australian Film Corporation, ITC Entertainment, Donald Crombie and Ken Hannam
brief_description: Based on the novel by Rolf Boldrewood, “Robbery Under Arms” tells the story of the legendary and daring bushranger - Captain Starlight. Starlight (Sam Neill) is the renegade of a noble English family with a taste for fine wine, romance and other men’s cattle. Starlight also has a talent for robbery under arms and with his team, they set out on a trail of adventure and action that takes them through many parts of Australia; mostly in defiance of the law. Cast also includes Ed Devereaux.
